type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Status Effect Tag

---



[Entity Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/status_effect_tag).

Checks whether an entity has any of the effects within a status effect tag with a specified amplifier and/or duration.

Type ID: `apugli:status_effect_tag`



---
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Status Effect Tag

---



[Entity Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/status_effect_tag).

Checks whether an entity has any of the effects within a status effect tag with a specified amplifier and/or duration.

Type ID: `apugli:status_effect_tag`



---

tag.description: The namespace and ID of the tag to check for.
tag.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the tag to check for.

min_amplifier.description: The minimum amplifier the status effect should have in order to pass the check.
min_amplifier.markdownDescription: The minimum amplifier the status effect should have in order to pass the check.

max_amplifier.description: The maximum amplifier the status effect should have in order to pass the check.
max_amplifier.markdownDescription: The maximum amplifier the status effect should have in order to pass the check.

min_duration.description: The minimum duration in ticks the status effect should have left in order to pass the check.
min_duration.markdownDescription: The minimum duration in ticks the status effect should have left in order to pass the check.

max_duration.description: The maximum duration in ticks the status effect should have left in order to pass the check.
max_duration.markdownDescription: The maximum duration in ticks the status effect should have left in order to pass the check.
